snippet.title: Clone Drone in the Hyperdome - Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Clone Drone in the Hyperdome is the new voxel destruction VR sword fighting game from Doborog! It will be released on Meta Quest 2 and 3 and PC via Steam on December 12, 2024. Wishlist on Meta and Steam: https://www.meta.com/en-gb/experiences/clone-drone-in-the-hyperdome/4523126804481573/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2401230/Clone_Drone_in_the_Hyperdome

Follow us to learn more about the game:
https://www.tiktok.com/@doborog
https://clonedroneinthehyperdome.com/
https://x.com/clonedronezone
https://www.twitch.tv/doborog

Clone Drone in the Hyperdome is a brand-new VR experience that features unique combat and an action-based storyline where players fight to the death against killer robots. Players will be able to pick up their swords in Clone Drone in the Hyperdome on Meta Quest 2 and 3 and PC via Steam on December 12, 2024. 

In Clone Drone in the Hyperdome, players sword fight against killer robots in an all-out VR tournament of death. Players take on the role of Blink, a teleporting robot who is the newest “looprunner” gladiator forced to compete in Crashloop, a deadly roguelike combat sport. Players die and reawaken in an endless loop, leap over lava pools, avoid turret fire and take down waves of enemy defendroids, as well as deal damage exactly where their cut lands using a stunning voxel combat engine. In order to win and feel freedom, players must battle their fellow looprunners for a chance to fight the Captain in the Hyperdome.
